 
Problem description.
Solve the Mystery.
See the sample test cases for hints. 

Input
Input description.
The first line contains an integer t denoting the number of test cases. It is followed by t lines of input, each containing the string whose secret code is to be calculated.

Output
Output description.
For each test case print the secret code of the given string.

Constraints
0 < Length of string <= 50 1 <= t <= 100

Example
Input:
3
CodeChef
Smart Coders
I LOVE YOU

Output:
8
56
143
